title: Deadlock when using lstm with multiprocessing on CentOS
body_html: I was just writing a rnn with multiprocessing for some test, and the input and output dimension are 2000 and 64 respectively, it works fine on Win10 and MacOS, but when I migrated this network to CentOS, this network was deadlock and when I changed the output dimension to 10 or lower, it could run again. I was wondering if anyone has the same issue like this? Thanks~
